Player History
Had first career hit on 4/15/1985, off LaMarr Hoyt (SD)...
Earned first career win on 4/15/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1985, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1985, going 4-1, 1.19...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1985, going 3-0, 0.97...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1986, going 3-0, 0.92...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1987, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1987, going 5-2, 1.83...
6/1/1988: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles, $12,400,000 per year, for 7 years.
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
Injured on 4/4/1989 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/24/1989 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 4/3/1990 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 5/23/1990 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to San Diego on 2/22/1991 (Going to SD: P Fernando Valenzuela. Going to LAD: P Ricky Bones)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1991, going 5-0, 1.38...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 9/3/1991, off Bob Milacki (NYM)...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
Struck out 15 batters against Montreal on 6/6/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
